lines.text: [Nan calculatingly exposes her legs]
You're wasting that panorama on me, Nan. Save it for Dave Slade.
Say, there isn't any punishment bad enough for you!
Yeah? Well, being penned up here with a daffodil like you comes awful close.
For a dumb Dick you have a memory like an elephant!
I've known David Slade, around this town, for the last ten years and you're the first skirt I ever saw him go for.
I'm not 'fraid of nobody in this jail. I'm doin' life and that's all I got.
In eight consecutive bank robbers we've had only one arrest - a girl!
If David Slade was District Attorney, he'd do something! I wish he was my son.
I wish he was my boyfriend!

[Nan walks into San Quentin Prison]
New fish! New fish!
New fish!
New fish!
New fish!
New fish!
Got a lot of nerve, haven't you?
So what!
I think its swell!
It'll take plenty to get by with in here. I've gone around with almost everything, but, it was baby's milk compared with coming through that gate with all these dames staring at you.

[Referring to a fellow female prisoner]
Watch out for her. She likes to wrestle.
I may be outta here myself, before long.
What do you mean out? Your parole ain't due for eight or nine months yet.
Yeah, but I might be able to use that Slade sap in some way?
You didn't have much luck with him last time.
I'll handle him different next time.
Hello, Nan.
Well, if it isn't old Dead-Eyed Dick, himself.
Gee, you look like a million dollar bonus.
When did you get out?
Yesterday.
No hard feelings?
No. Say, you have your racket and I have mine.
And once in awhile they don't mix so well.
Sure.
Well, so long Nan. I'll tell the boys at headquarters that you're in circulation again. They'd be glad to know it.
You would.
Listen. Don't think you can walk in here and take over this joint. There's a lot of big sharks in here that just live on fresh fish like you.
Yeah, when they add you up what do you spell?
